1.  Data

    ```{r}

    library(readr)
    adae <- read_csv("https://rhoinc.github.io/data-library/data/clinical-trials/adam/adae.csv")
    View(adae)
    ```

2.  Viz

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(adae) +
  aes(x = AESEV, y = AGE, fill = SEX) +
  geom_col() +
  scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
  theme_minimal()

```
